WEATHER FORECAST FOR 07 FEBRUARY 2024
Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 07 February 2024
Mainly fair weather will prevail over the island.

T
here is a possibility of ground frost at some places in Nuwara-Eliya district during the early
hours of the morning.

M
isty conditions can be expected at some places in Central,  Sabaragamuwa, Western and
Uva provinces and in Galle and Matara districts during the morning.
